entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • gRPC JSON transcoding: Append values to collections #47896
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #47892
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #47891
  • [Blazor] Add synchronization context to webassembly when multithreaded runtime is enabled #47888
    8.0-preview5
  • Static web assets SDK support for multi targeting conventions #47885
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Allow to modify the bind method for Blazor InputComponents #47882
    Backlog
  • [Blazor web assembly] On page reload for a deployed app, set environment (environment's appsettings file) not being picked #47881
  • [blazor] Remove reference to BINDING api in global namespace #47878
    8.0-preview5
  • [Blazor] SetUpdatesAttributeName #47877

Closed

  • When [Authorize] is not written on method, Task.FromResult(AuthenticateResult.Fail is ignored #47846
  • MessagePack deserialization throws error when using Lz4BlockArray compression #46787
    8.0-preview4
  • Support emitting logs when binding fails in code generated endpoints #46362
    8.0-preview4
  • Support binding form parameters in RDG #47200
    8.0-preview4
  • Stop Calling JSON GetTypeInfo with the runtime type #47548
    8.0-preview4
  • HubConnection StartAsync in hosted PWA Blazor Webassembly takes too long in chromium based browsers #47709
  • Update Identity UI to use Blazor Components #47233
    8.0-preview5
  • too many same/different aspnetcore templates #47849
  • Embed mono-config.json inside blazor.boot.json #47243
    8.0-preview5
  • Build script (sh) does not correctly detect FreeBSD #47838
  • Blazor Sections don't handle SectionName correctly #47552
    8.0-preview4
  • Change behavior of `<a href="#..."></a>` #47687
    8.0-preview4
  • Blazor InputFile component does not work when registering AutofacServiceProviderFactory #47875
  • Test Issue #4 #47874

PullRequests

Created

  • Replace ISystemClock in SignalR #47895
    area-signalr
  • Enable prebuilt detection #47894
    area-infrastructure
  • Update branding to preview5 #47890
    area-infrastructure
  • [GenerateEmbeddedResourcesManifest] handle Items with empty LogicalName #29306 #47887
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fixing https://github.com/dotnet/aspnetcore/issues/47857 #47886
    area-blazor
  • Fixed Router renders component twice #47880
    area-blazor
  • Fewer `System.Exception` #47873
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Add links to available REPLs #47893
    needs-area-label, 8.0-preview4
  • Update MessagePack version #47790
    area-signalr, 8.0-preview4
  • [Blazor] Add support for accessing the request body form parameters #47814
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Stop Calling JSON GetTypeInfo with the runtime type #47859
    area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4
  • change 'ValuesController' to 'ValueController' #47474
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix platform detection for FreeBSD #47839
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • Change behavior of `<a href="#.."></a>` #47851
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Fixed bug in Sections #47870
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • [blazor] Apply disableDotnet6Compatibility to fix hotreload #47876
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview5
  • Add metrics to rate limiting #47758
    blocked, area-runtime
  • Obsolete and replace ISystemClock in Security, Identity #47472 #47717
    breaking-change, area-security, needs-breaking-change-announcement
  • RDG metadata generation based on endpoint response type. #47741
    area-runtime
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Guard ILogger calls that do work at call site #47837
    area-runtime
  • http.sys; add opt-in support for kernel-mode response buffering #47776
    area-runtime, servers-httpsys, area-perf
  • [release/7.0] Fix RequestBody logging when zero byte read is used #47811
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 7.0.x
  • Change incorrect usage of ArgumentNullException #47731
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2166956 #47784
    area-mvc
  • [release/7.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.4.0 -> 6.5.0) #47861
    Servicing-consider, area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Update Swashbuckle.AspNetCore (6.2.3 -> 6.5.0) #47860
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [blazor] Set Cross-Origin-Policy headers for multi-threaded runtime #47855
    area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview4
  • [SignalR] Seamless Reconnect #47748
    area-signalr
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Update SDK #47540
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr
